headline: Assessing Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) Valuation After Recent Short-Term Share Price Momentum
summary: Recent share performance and what it might signal With no single headline event driving the move, Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) has quietly posted a 4.6% gain over the past day and double digit returns over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Stanley Black & Decker. That recent 4.6% 1 day share price return sits on top of a 7.4% 7 day and 11.4% 30 day share price return. At the same time, the year to date share price return of 5.6% and mixed total shareholder returns...
